description: The Exlester Continent had once been a beautiful land. But it was destroyed ruthlessly by a war between witches. At last a hero of the Archangel decedent put the war to an end by sealing the power of those witches. But it was too late, By the mighty magic, The beautiful Exlester Continent Was into the winter forever.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit) Processor: 1.6 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/Windows 7/8/8.1/10 Processor: 1.6 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound
